page.title: 12A SMALL VILLAGE GARAGE
page.content: Oakley's is a small garage it sells Ford Cars and a few old ones. There are petrol pumps that hold 2 star, 4 star and diesel fuel, there is a small shop where you can buy things for the car and sweets. There is a line across the forecourt that the cars run over, this makes a bell ring and someone will come out of the workshop and serve you. There is an Air Line and a Car Washer for customers to use. It has a repair workshop with a hoist where cars go if they have been involved in a crash and they also sell spare parts. At the back of the garage there is a car park where both new and old cars are parked.The Garage is right next to the Council Houses and opposite the Catholic Church.
